title: NP-Match: Towards a New Probabilistic Model for Semi-Supervised Learning. (arXiv:2301.13569v2 [cs.CV] UPDATED)
abstract: Semi-supervised learning (SSL) has been widely explored in recent years, and it is an effective way of leveraging unlabeled data to reduce the reliance on labeled data. In this work, we adjust neural processes (NPs) to the semi-supervised image classification task, resulting in a new method named NP-Match. NP-Match is suited to this task for two reasons. Firstly, NP-Match implicitly compares data points when making predictions, and as a result, the prediction of each unlabeled data point is affected by the labeled data points that are similar to it, which improves the quality of pseudo-labels. Secondly, NP-Match is able to estimate uncertainty that can be used as a tool for selecting unlabeled samples with reliable pseudo-labels. Compared with uncertainty-based SSL methods implemented with Monte-Carlo (MC) dropout, NP-Match estimates uncertainty with much less computational overhead, which can save time at both the training and the testing phases. translated_title: NP-Match：面向半监督学习的新概率模型
translated_abstract: 近年来，半监督学习（SSL）得到了广泛探索，并成为利用未标记数据减少依赖标记数据的有效方法。本文将神经过程（NPs）调整为半监督图像分类任务，得到一种名为NP-Match的新方法。NP-Match适用于此任务，原因在于它隐含地比较数据点来进行预测，因此每个未标记的数据点的预测受到相似标记数据点的影响，从而改善了伪标签的质量。其次，NP-Match能够估计可用作选择可靠伪标签未标记样本的工具的不确定性。与使用Monte-Carlo（MC）dropout实现的基于不确定性的SSL方法相比，NP-Match具有更少的计算开销来估计不确定性，可以在训练和测试阶段节省时间。我们在常用SSL数据集上进行了广泛的实验，证明了NP-Match在半监督任务上的优越性能。
tldr: NP-Match是一种适用于半监督图像分类任务的新方法，它能够通过比较数据点进行预测，并能够以较小的计算开销估计不确定性，从而提高伪标签的质量，选择可靠的伪标签未标记样本。
